column1: '''Harvestmath''' is the name of the ninth month in the [[Bree Calendar]] (used by the [[Hobbits]] of [[Bree]])
column2: following [[Wedmath]]. In the [[Shire]] the month was known as [[Halimath]].<ref>{{App|D}}</ref>

column1: The name represents a [[Hobbitish|modernization]] of an [[Old English]] name for September
